official_title: A bill to amend the Privacy Act of 1974 to impose additional restrictions on the maintenance and disclosure of mailing lists by Government agencies.

summary.as: Reported to House amended, Part I
summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Government Operations with amendment, H. Rept. 97-147 (Part I)) Amends the Privacy Act of 1974 to prohibit Federal agencies from disclosing an individual's address containing a zip code of more than five digits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Privacy Act of 1974 to impose additional restrictions on the maintenance and disclosure of mailing lists by Government agencies.
